author: felicity
msg: bug 2178: the hostname used via _HOSTNAME_ was not necessarily a FQDN.
so we'll now do a best effort attempt to figure out the FQDN.  we'll also
cache the hostname, since it's not likely to change between messages,
to avoid constant calls to /bin/hostname and the like.

author: felicity
msg: bug 2156: dccifd didn't work correctly with all versions of DCC, but it should now. :)

msg: cleaned up the expiration documentation a little more

msg: bug 2158: change the terse report to be formatted and put the score first.
